summary: A photographer invites her closest friends to vacation at her family's home in Goa in celebration of her upcoming marriage.
cast: Sarah-Jane Dias|Rajshri Deshpande|Sandhya Mridul|Amrit Maghera|Pavleen Gujral|Anushka Manchanda|Tannishtha Chatterjee|Anuj Choudhry|Jeffrey Goldberg|Adil Hussain|Aditya Suhas Jambhale|Vikram Kochhar|Arjun Mathur|Kkunal Shinde
title: 7 diosas
